name: Fire! - A pirate game without a Kraken
name_original: Fire! - A pirate game without a Kraken
description:
Challenge your friends on your pirate ship, but remember that sometimes the old legends about ghosts in this sea are more than just stories.

- 4 players deathmatch

- Couch competition to prove who among you is the best pirate leader!

- Fight with the Flying Dutch to prove your courage... and to gain more points than your opponents;)

Gamepads are needed to play the game. If you have any issues with inputs not working correctly try starting the game with all gamepads disconnected and connect them once you're in the main menu

Special thanks to Kenney for the 3D models
